Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, nothing special”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_Ch
Reviews.Content: ive stayed flower garden 2 nights im satisfied stay hotel advertised 3 star hotel pretty lives european standard 3 star hotels tourist business hotel clean spacious hotel located walking distance termini railway station plaza republica metro neighbourhood plenty bars restaurants staff ok mix getting double bed instead twin bed wouldnt fix told twin beds found double beds twin beds able fix ourselves dissapointed breakfast poor 3 star hotel despite expensive price breakfast local cafes

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Cold Tiny Hotel !”
Reviews.Author: HaeleyK
Reviews.Content: booked stay 2 nights march 2012 arrived 10am friday told ready store luggage map sent returned 5pm tired flight walking round colosseum hungry told pipe burst booked hotel door called flower garden stay night return morning flower garden tiny 2 single beds tiny shower dark dull quiet comfy night hadnt payed twin breakfast cake cereal slices bread impero following day told held bags ready returned 4pm marble extremly cold damp tv shower bath horrible single beds hard uncomfortable wooden noisy slightest movement 2am woken horrific scary banging noise frightened life explanation baack sleep noisey people street street cleaners stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “A mediocre experience in a fabulous city”
Reviews.Author: gianntrip
Reviews.Content: hotel disappointed location convenient service wasnt satisfying bathroom narrow couldnt actually body raise hands washed furthermore annoying deep noise occasionally didnt rest

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: MeghanB88
Reviews.Content: rate booked rome location close train station looking luxury bathroom mediocre complaints front desk guys smoked smelled smoke including towels etc bit gross breakfast included pretty bad yogurt machine bad coffee stale pastries blah

Reviews.Title: “Don't let this terrible hotel ruin your Rome vacation”
Reviews.Author: YoungCouple1111
Reviews.Content: booked 3 nights september sleep due heat aircon reception talk italian pretentious transfer aircon maybe aircon im philippines am hot weather hotel window oven sleep youre mind finally exhausted 3am wake headache look hotel maps lots hotels nearby

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and quiet rooms in the heart of Rome”
Reviews.Author: Blueheron5
Reviews.Content: somewhat characterless value hotel facilities short stay city appointed ensuite facilities clean modern hotel welllocated 15 minutes walk termini railway metro station walking distance colosseum trevi fountain continental breakfast buffet adequate welcomed fresh fruit front desk helpful

Reviews.Title: “Good Location and Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ilovetraveling188590
Reviews.Content: hotel close main roma station 5 8 minutes walk hotel clean staff helpful ac functioned cooling acs atleast feel hot italy breakfast ok stayed 3 nights complaints bit considering proximity station lots restaurants cost accommodation adjusted pleasant stay reached check time ready experience hesitate stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Find another place to stay”
Reviews.Author: keylanna
Reviews.Content: based hotels description excited stay disappointed service terrible nosmoking requested heavy scent stale cigarette smoke windows freshen towels changed daily staff downright curt am demanding traveler safe clean stay staff courteous answer questions flower garden hotel worst ive experienced

Reviews.Title: “great location, clean”
Reviews.Author: bosmanli2482
Reviews.Content: hotel wonderful price 10 min walk colloseum trevi fountain metro nearby clean excellent breakfast provided morning hotel service expect horrible service hotel snappy rude employee named stefano wonderful cross fingers front desk overall wonderful experience

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but staff leave a lot to be desired”
Reviews.Author: passionflower2104
Reviews.Content: location minutes termini metro bus clean shower 2 hotel concerned inability refusal control noisy guests public corridors late night secondly lack customer service simple question times trains termini airport phone internet disposal surely question curt reply train station service difference returning hotel

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, very friendly helpful staff.”
Reviews.Author: carlaparry84
Reviews.Content: hotel central location near termini station spent 4 nights february clean staff reception helpful ensuite bathroom television continental breakfast provided lot choice pastries toast cheeses meat jam bread hotel ideal city break value money definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Mullibull
Reviews.Content: staff friendly clue walked told key key breakfast liked location hotel close people arriving train taking train airport restaurants close metro bus walking distance colosseum

Reviews.Title: “Very nice!!!”
Reviews.Author: MikeB1234_10
Reviews.Content: hotel gotten bad reviews personally experiencing honestly beautiful hotel aircon comfortable private quiet breakfast sufficient breads cereals fruit juices hot drinks hotel located walking distance termini attractions cafes youll doing sleeping getting breakfast price purpose consider bb extremely nice

Reviews.Title: “More like a prison cell than a 3 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Dana007005
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights march location opinion close termini station nice definitely charming stay visit rome am hotels found beautiful campo di fiori piazza navona tiniest ive stayed stayed 3 star hotels europe times past 3 star hotel barely 1 star youth hostels hotel wasnt clean bathroom horrible toilet stains looked hasnt changed 20 towel dark stains mistaken origin privacy whatsoever hear corridor feel hear breakfast poor decided theres punish ourselves ate breakfast elsewhere rome lovely time definitely choose hotel pay extra 3040 euros stay hotel basic 3 star hotel location night main restaurants bars located center trevi navona campo fi fiori etc

HotelInfo.Name: Flower Garden Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 7 Viminale Street, 00184 Rome, Italy
